reuters.title: FOOTE MINERAL <FTE> SELLS CAMBRIDGE PLANT
reuters.body:
Foote Mineral Co said it signed a letter of intent with Shieldalloy Corp, a wholly-owned subsidiary of <Metallurg Inc>, for the sale of its Cambridge, Ohio, business. The company said the sale, which will be explained in greater detail after the definitive agreement has been signed, is part of Foote's previously-announced plan to sell the entire company.
